sp.p: ti/ to\ pra=gma touti/; deu=ro pa/lin badiste/on.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: *)/apollon—o(/s pou *dh=lon h)\ *puqw=n' e)/xeis.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: h)/lghsen: ou)k h)/kousas;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
ou)k e)/gwg', e)pei\
i)/ambon *(ippw/naktos a)nemimnh|sko/mhn.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ou)de\n poiei=s ga/r: a)lla\ ta\s lago/nas spo/dei.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: ma\ to\n *di/' a)ll' h)/dh pa/rexe th\n gaste/ra.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: *po/seidon

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: h)/lghse/n tis.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: o(\s *ai)gai/ou prw=nas h)\ glauka=s me/deis a(lo\s e)n be/nqesin.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
ou)/ toi ma\ th\n *dh/mhtra du/namai/ pw maqei=n
o(po/teros u(mw=n e)sti qeo/s. a)ll' ei)/siton:
o( despo/ths ga\r au)to\s u(ma=s gnw/setai
xh) *ferre/fatq', a(/t' o)/nte ka)kei/nw qew/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
o)rqw=s le/geis: e)boulo/mhn d' a)\n tou=to/ se
pro/teron noh=sai, pri\n e)me\ ta\s plhga\s labei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
*mou=sa xorw=n i(erw=n: e)pi/bhqi kai\ e)/lq' e)pi\ te/ryin a)oida=s e)ma=s,
to\n polu\n o)yome/nh law=n: o)/xlon, ou(= sofi/ai
muri/ai ka/qhntai
filotimo/terai *kleofw=ntos, e)f' ou(= dh\ xei/lesin a)mfila/lois
deino\n e)pibre/metai
*qrh|ki/a xelidw\n
†e)pi\ ba/rbaron e(zome/nh pe/talon: †
keladei= d' e)pi/klauton a)hdo/nion no/mon, w(s a)polei=tai,
ka)\n i)/sai ge/nwntai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
to\n i(ero\n xoro\n di/kaio/n e)sti xrhsta\ th=| po/lei
cumparainei=n kai\ dida/skein. prw=ton ou)=n h(mi=n dokei=
e)cisw=sai tou\s poli/tas ka)felei=n ta\ dei/mata,
kei)/ tis h(/marte sfalei/s ti *fruni/xou palai/smasin,
e)ggene/sqai fhmi\ xrh=nai toi=s o)lisqou=sin to/te
ai)ti/an e)kqei=si lu=sai ta\s pro/teron a(marti/as.
ei)=t' a)/timo/n fhmi xrh=nai mhde/n' ei)=n' e)n th=| po/lei:
kai\ ga\r ai)sxro/n e)sti tou\s me\n naumaxh/santas mi/an
kai\ *plataia=s eu)qu\s ei)=nai ka)nti\ dou/lwn despo/tas.
kou)de\ tau=t' e)/gwg' e)/xoim' a)\n mh\ ou) kalw=s fa/skein e)/xein,
a)ll' e)painw=: mo/na ga\r au)ta\ nou=n e)/xont' e)dra/sate.
pro\s de\ tou/tois ei)ko\s u(ma=s, oi(\ meq' u(mw=n polla\ dh\
xoi) pate/res e)nauma/xhsan kai\ prosh/kousin ge/nei,
th\n mi/an tau/thn parei=nai cumfora\n ai)toume/nois.
a)lla\ th=s o)rgh=s a)ne/ntes w)= sofw/tatoi fu/sei
pa/ntas a)nqrw/pous e(ko/ntes suggenei=s kthsw/meqa
ka)piti/mous kai\ poli/tas, o(/stis a)\n cunnaumaxh=|.
ei) de\ tau=t' o)gkwso/mesqa ka)posemnunou/meqa,
th\n po/lin kai\ tau=t' e)/xontes kuma/twn e)n a)gka/lais,
u(ste/rw| xro/nw| pot' au)=qis eu)= fronei=n ou) do/comen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ei) d' e)gw\ o)rqo\s i)dei=n bi/on a)ne/ros h)\ tro/pon o(/stis e)/t'
oi)mw/cetai,
ou) polu\n ou)d' o( pi/qhkos ou(=tos o( nu=n e)noxlw=n,
*kleige/nhs o( mikro/s,
o( ponhro/tatos balaneu\s o(po/soi kratou=si kukhsite/frou
yeudoli/trou koni/as
kai\ *kimwli/as gh=s,
xro/non e)ndiatri/yei: i)dw\n de\ ta/d' ou)k
ei)rhniko\s e)/sq', i(/na mh/ pote ka)poduqh=| mequ/wn a)/neu
cu/lou badi/zwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
polla/kis g' h(mi=n e)/docen h( po/lis peponqe/nai
tau)to\n e)/s te tw=n politw=n tou\s kalou/s te ka)gaqou\s
e)/s te ta)rxai=on no/misma kai\ to\ kaino\n xrusi/on.
ou)/te ga\r tou/toisin ou)=sin ou) kekibdhleume/nois,
a)lla\ kalli/stois a(pa/ntwn, w(s dokei=, nomisma/twn
kai\ mo/nois o)rqw=s kopei=si kai\ kekwdwnisme/nois
e)/n te toi=s *(/ellhsi kai\ toi=s barba/roisi pantaxou=
xrw/meq' ou)de/n, a)lla\ tou/tois toi=s ponhroi=s xalki/ois
xqe/s te kai\ prw/hn kopei=si tw=| kaki/stw| ko/mmati.
tw=n politw=n q' ou(\s me\n i)/smen eu)genei=s kai\ sw/fronas
a)/ndras o)/ntas kai\ dikai/ous kai\ kalou/s te ka)gaqou\s
kai\ trafe/ntas e)n palai/strais kai\ xoroi=s kai\ mousikh=|,
prouselou=men, toi=s de\ xalkoi=s kai\ ce/nois kai\ purri/ais
kai\ ponhroi=s ka)k ponhrw=n ei)s a(/panta xrw/meqa
u(sta/tois a)figme/noisin, oi(=sin h( po/lis pro\ tou=
ou)de\ farmakoi=sin ei)kh=| r(a|di/ws e)xrh/sat' a)/n.
a)lla\ kai\ nu=n w)=no/htoi metabalo/ntes tou\s tro/pous
xrh=sqe toi=s xrhstoi=sin au)=qis: kai\ katorqw/sasi ga\r
eu)/logon, ka)/n ti sfalh=t', e)c a)ci/ou gou=n tou= cu/lou,
h)/n ti kai\ pa/sxhte, pa/sxein toi=s sofoi=s dokh/sete.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *di/a to\n swth=ra genna/das a)nh\r
o( despo/ths sou.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p:
pw=s ga\r ou)xi\ genna/das,
o(/stis ge pi/nein oi)=de kai\ binei=n mo/non;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
to\ de\ mh\ pata/cai s' e)celegxqe/nt' a)/ntikrus,
o(/ti dou=los w)\n e)/faskes ei)=nai despo/ths.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: w)/|mwce me/nta)/n.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
tou=to me/ntoi douliko\n
eu)qu\s pepoi/hkas, o(/per e)gw\ xai/rw poiw=n.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: xai/reis, i(keteu/w;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
ma)ll' e)popteu/ein dokw=,
o(/tan katara/swmai la/qra| tw=| despo/th|.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p:
ti/ de\ tonqoru/zwn, h(ni/k' a)\n plhga\s labw\n
polla\s a)pi/h|s qu/raze;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: kai\ tou=q' h(/domai.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ti/ de\ polla\ pra/ttwn;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: w(s ma\ *di/' ou)de\n oi)=d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p:
o(mo/gnie *zeu=: kai\ parakou/wn despotw=n
a(/tt' a)\n lalw=si;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: ma)lla\ plei=n h)\ mai/nomai.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ti/ de\ toi=s qu/raze tau=ta katalalw=n;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
e)gw/;
ma\ *di/' a)ll' o(/tan drw= tou=to, ka)kmiai/nomai.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p:
w)= *foi=b' *)/apollon e)/mbale/ moi th\n decia/n,
kai\ do\s ku/sai kau)to\s ku/son, kai/ moi fra/son
pro\s *dio/s, o(\s h(mi=n e)stin o(momastigi/as,
ti/s ou(=tos ou(/ndon e)sti\ qo/rubos kai\ boh\
xw) loidorhsmo/s;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: *ai)sxu/lou keu)ripi/dou.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
pra=gma pra=gma me/ga keki/nhtai me/ga
e)n toi=s nekroi=si kai\ sta/sis pollh\ pa/nu.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: e)k tou=;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
no/mos tis e)nqa/d' e)sti\ kei/menos
a)po\ tw=n texnw=n o(/sai mega/lai kai\ deciai/,
to\n a)/riston o)/nta tw=n e(autou= sunte/xnwn
si/thsin au)to\n e)n prutanei/w| lamba/nein
qro/non te tou= *plou/twnos e(ch=s—

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: manqa/nw.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
e(/ws a)fi/koito th\n te/xnhn sofw/teros
e(/tero/s tis au)tou=: to/te de\ paraxwrei=n e)/dei.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ti/ dh=ta touti\ teqoru/bhken *ai)sxu/lon;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
e)kei=nos ei)=xe to
 tragw|diko
 qro/non,
w(s w)
 kra/tistos th
 te/xnhn.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: nuni\ de\ ti/s;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
o(/te dh\ kath=lq' *eu)ripi/dhs, e)pedei/knuto
toi=s lwpodu/tais kai\ toi=si ballantioto/mois
kai\ toi=si patraloi/aisi kai\ toixwru/xois,
o(/per e)/st' e)n *(/aidou plh=qos, oi( d' a)krow/menoi
tw=n a)ntilogiw=n kai\ lugismw=n kai\ strofw=n
u(perema/nhsan ka)no/misan sofw/taton:
ka)/peit' e)parqei\s a)ntela/beto tou= qro/nou,
i(/n' *ai)sxu/los kaqh=sto.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: kou)k e)ba/lleto;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' a)ll' o( dh=mos a)nebo/a kri/sin poiei=n
o(po/teros ei)/h th\n te/xnhn sofw/teros.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: o( tw=n panou/rgwn;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: nh\ *di/' ou)ra/nio/n g' o(/son.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: met' *ai)sxu/lou d' ou)k h)=san e(/teroi su/mmaxoi;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: o)li/gon to\ xrhsto/n e)stin, w(/sper e)nqa/de.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ti/ dh=q' o( *plou/twn dra=n paraskeua/zetai;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
a)gw=na poiei=n au)ti/ka ma/la kai\ kri/sin
ka)/legxon au)tw=n th=s te/xnhs.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p:
ka)/peita pw=s
ou) kai\ *sofokle/hs a)ntela/beto tou= qro/nou;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' ou)k e)kei=nos, a)ll' e)/kuse me\n *ai)sxu/lon,
o(/te dh\ kath=lqe, ka)ne/bale th\n decia/n,
ka)kei=nos u(pexw/rhsen au)tw=| tou= qro/nou:
nuni\ d' e)/mellen, w(s e)/fh *kleidhmi/dhs,
e)/fedros kaqedei=sqai: ka)\n me\n *ai)sxu/los krath=|,
e(/cein kata\ xw/ran: ei) de\ mh/, peri\ th=s te/xnhs
diagwniei=sq' e)/faske pro/s g' *eu)ripi/dhn.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: to\ xrh=m' a)/r' e)/stai;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
nh\ *di/' o)li/gon u(/steron.
ka)ntau=qa dh\ ta\ deina\ kinhqh/setai.
kai\ ga\r tala/ntw| mousikh\ staqmh/setai—

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: ti/ de/; meiagwgh/sousi th\n tragw|di/an;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
kai\ kano/nas e)coi/sousi kai\ ph/xeis e)pw=n
kai\ plai/sia cu/mptukta—

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: plinqeu/sousi ga/r;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
kai\ diame/trous kai\ sfh=nas. o( ga\r *eu)ripi/dhs
kat' e)/pos basaniei=n fhsi ta\s tragw|di/as.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: h)= pou bare/ws oi)=mai to\n *ai)sxu/lon fe/rein.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p: e)/bleye gou=n taurhdo\n e)gku/yas ka/tw.

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: krinei= de\ dh\ ti/s tau=ta;

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
tou=t' h)=n du/skolon:
sofw=n ga\r a)ndrw=n a)pori/an hu(riske/thn.
ou)/te ga\r *)aqhnai/oisi sune/bain' *ai)sxu/los—

sp.speaker: *canqi/as
sp.p: pollou\s i)/sws e)no/mize tou\s toixwru/xous.

sp.speaker: *)/aiakos
sp.p:
lh=ro/n te ta)/ll' h(gei=to tou= gnw=nai pe/ri
fu/seis poihtw=n: ei)=ta tw=| sw=| despo/th|
e)pe/treyan, o(tih\ th=s te/xnhs e)/mpeiros h)=n.
a)ll' ei)si/wmen: w(s o(/tan g' oi( despo/tai
e)spouda/kwsi, klau/maq' h(mi=n gi/gnetai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
h)= pou deino\n e)ribreme/tas xo/lon e)/ndoqen e(/cei,
h(ni/k' a)\n o)cu/lalon pari/dh| qh/gontos o)do/nta
a)ntite/xnou: to/te dh\ mani/as u(po\ deinh=s
o)/mmata strobh/setai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
e)/stai d' i(ppolo/fwn te lo/gwn koruqai/ola nei/kh
sxindala/mwn te paraco/nia smileu/mata/ t' e)/rgwn,
fwto\s a)munome/nou frenote/ktonos a)ndro\s
r(h/maq' i(ppoba/mona.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
fri/cas d' au)toko/mou lofia=s lasiau/xena xai/tan,
deino\n e)pisku/nion cuna/gwn bruxw/menos h(/sei
r(h/mata gomfopagh= pinakhdo\n a)pospw=n
ghgenei= fush/mati:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
e)/nqen dh\ stomatourgo\s e)pw=n basani/stria li/sfh
glw=ss' a)nelissome/nh fqonerou\s kinou=sa xalinou\s
r(h/mata daiome/nh kataleptologh/sei
pleumo/nwn polu\n po/non.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
ou)k a)\n meqei/mhn tou= qro/nou, mh\ nouqe/tei.
krei/ttwn ga\r ei)=nai/ fhmi tou/tou th\n te/xnhn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: *ai)sxu/le ti/ siga=|s; ai)sqa/nei ga\r tou= lo/gou.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
a)posemnunei=tai prw=ton, a(/per e(ka/stote
e)n tai=s tragw|di/aisin e)terateu/eto.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: w)= daimo/ni' a)ndrw=n mh\ mega/la li/an le/ge.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
e)gw)=|da tou=ton kai\ die/skemmai pa/lai,
a)/nqrwpon a)griopoio\n au)qado/stomon,
e)/xont' a)xa/linon a)krate\s a)pu/lwton sto/ma,
a)perila/lhton kompofakelorrh/mona.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
*dio/nusos
sp.p:
pau=' *ai)sxu/le,
kai\ mh\ pro\s o)rgh\n spla/gxna qermh/nh|s ko/tw|.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ou) dh=ta pri/n g' a)
 tou=ton a)pofh/nw safw=s
to
 xwlopoio
 oi(=os w)
 qrasu/netai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
a)/rn' a)/rna me/lana pai=des e)cene/gkate:
tufw\s ga\r e)kbai/nein paraskeua/zetai.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
w)= *krhtika\s me\n sulle/gwn monw|di/as,
ga/mous d' a)nosi/ous e)sfe/rwn e)s th\n te/xnhn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
e)pi/sxes ou(=tos w)= poluti/mht' *ai)sxu/le.
a)po\ tw=n xalazw=n d' w)= po/nhr' *eu)ripi/dh
a)/nage seauto\n e)kpodw/n, ei) swfronei=s,
i(/na mh\ kefalai/w| to\n kro/tafo/n sou r(h/mati
qenw\n u(p' o)rgh=s e)kxe/h| to\n *th/lefon:
su\ de\ mh\ pro\s o)rgh\n *ai)sxu/l' a)lla\ pra|o/nws
e)/legx' e)le/gxou: loidorei=sqai d' ou) pre/pei
a)/ndras poihta\s w(/sper a)rtopw/lidas.
su\ d' eu)qu\s w(/sper pri=nos e)mprhsqei\s boa=|s.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
e(/toimo/s ei)m' e)/gwge, kou)k a)nadu/omai,
da/knein da/knesqai pro/teros, ei) tou/tw| dokei=,
ta)/ph, ta\ me/lh, ta\ neu=ra th=s tragw|di/as,
kai\ nh\ *di/a to\n *phle/a ge kai\ to\n *ai)/olon
kai\ to\n *mele/agron ka)/ti ma/la to\n *th/lefon.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: ti/ dai\ su\ bouleu/ei poiei=n; le/g' *ai)sxu/le.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
e)boulo/mhn me\n ou)k e)ri/zein e)nqa/de:
ou)k e)c i)/sou ga/r e)stin a(gw\n nw=|n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: ti/ dai/;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
o(/ti h( poi/hsis ou)xi\ sunte/qnhke/ moi,
tou/tw| de\ sunte/qnhken, w(/sq' e(/cei le/gein.
o(/mws d' e)peidh/ soi dokei=, dra=n tau=ta xrh/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
i)/qi nun libanwto\n deu=ro/ tis kai\ pu=r do/tw.
o(/pws a)\n eu)/cwmai pro\ tw=n sofisma/twn
a)gw=na kri=nai to/nde mousikw/tata:
u(mei=s de\ tai=s *mou/sais ti me/los u(pa/|sate.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
w)= *dio\s e)nne/a parqe/noi a(gnai\
*mou=sai, leptolo/gous cuneta\s fre/nas ai(\ kaqora=te
a)ndrw=n gnwmotu/pwn, o(/tan ei)s e)/rin o)cumeri/mnois
e)/lqwsi strebloi=si palai/smasin a)ntilogou=ntes,
e)/lqet' e)poyo/menai du/namin
deinota/toin stoma/toin pori/sasqai
r(h/mata kai\ parapri/smat' e)pw=n.
nu=n ga\r a)gw\n sofi/as o( me/gas xwrei= pro\s e)/rgon h)/dh.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: eu)/xesqe dh\ kai\ sfw/ ti pri\n ta)/ph le/gein.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
*dh/mhter h( qre/yasa th\n e)mh\n fre/na,
ei)=nai/ me tw=n sw=n a)/cion musthri/wn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: e)pi/qes labw\n dh\ kai\ su\ libanwto/n.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
kalw=s:
e(/teroi ga/r ei)sin oi(=sin eu)/xomai qeoi=s.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: i)/dioi/ tine/s soi, ko/mma kaino/n;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: kai\ ma/la.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: i)/qi dh\ proseu/xou toi=sin i)diw/tais qeoi=s.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
ai)qh\r e)mo\n bo/skhma kai\ glw/sshs stro/figc
kai\ cu/nesi kai\ mukth=res o)sfranth/rioi,
o)rqw=s m' e)le/gxein w(=n a)\n a(/ptwmai lo/gwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
kai\ mh\n h(mei=s e)piqumou=men
para\ sofoi=n a)ndroi=n a)kou=sai
ti/na lo/gwn e)mme/leian
e)/pite dai/+an o(do/n.
glw=ssa me\n ga\r h)gri/wtai,
lh=ma d' ou)k a)/tolmon a)mfoi=n,
ou)d' a)ki/nhtoi fre/nes.
prosdoka=n ou)=n ei)ko/s e)sti
to\n me\n a)stei=o/n ti le/cein
kai\ katerrinhme/non,
to\n d' a)naspw=nt' au)topre/mnois
toi=s lo/goisin
e)mpeso/nta suskeda=n polla\s
a)lindh/qras e)pw=n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
a)ll' w(s ta/xista xrh\ le/gein: ou(/tw d' o(/pws e)rei=ton
a)stei=a kai\ mh/t' ei)ko/nas mh/q' oi(=' a)\n a)/llos ei)/poi.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
kai\ mh
 e)mauto
 me/n ge th
 poi/hsin oi(=o/s ei)mi,
e)n toi=sin u(sta/tois fra/sw, tou=ton de\ prw=t' e)le/gcw,
w(s h)=n a)lazw
 kai\ fe/nac oi(/ois te tou\s qeata\s
e)chpa/ta mw/rous labw
 para\ *fruni/xw| trafe/ntas.
prw/tista me
 ga e(/na tin' a)
 kaqi=sen e)gkalu/yas,
*)axille/a tin' h)\ *nio/bhn, to\ pro/swpon ou)xi\ deiknu/s,
pro/sxhma th=s tragw|di/as, gru/zontas ou)de\ touti/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: ma\ to\n *di/' ou) dh=q'.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
o( de\ xoro/s g' h)/reiden o(rmaqou\s a)\n
melw=n e)fech=s te/ttaras cunexw=s a)/n oi( d' e)si/gwn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
e)gw\ d' e)/xairon th=| siwph=|, kai/ me tou=t' e)/terpen
ou)x h(=tton h)\ nu=n oi( lalou=ntes.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
h)li/qios ga\r h)=sqa,
sa/f' i)/sqi.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: ka)mautw=| dokw=. ti/ de\ tau=t' e)/dras' o( dei=na;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
u(p' a)lazonei/as, i(/n' o( qeath\s prosdokw=n kaqoi=to,
o(po/q' h( *nio/bh ti fqe/gcetai: to\ dra=ma d' a)\n dih/|ei.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
w)\ pampo/nhros, oi(=' a)/r' e)fenakizo/mhn u(p' au)tou=.
ti/ skordina=| kai\ dusforei=s;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
o(/ti au)to\n e)cele/gxw.
ka)/peit' e)peidh\ tau=ta lhrh/seie kai\ to\ dra=ma
h)/dh mesoi/h, r(h/mat' a)\n bo/eia dw/dek' ei)=pen,
o)fru=s e)/xonta kai\ lo/fous, dei/n' a)/tta mormorwpa/,
a)/gnwta toi=s qewme/nois.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p: oi)/moi ta/las.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: siw/pa.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: safe\s d' a)\n ei)=pen ou)de\ e(/n—

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: mh\ pri=e tou\s o)do/ntas.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
a)ll' h)\ *skama/ndrous h)\ ta/frous h)\ 'p' a)spi/dwn e)po/ntas
grupaie/tous xalkhla/tous kai\ r(h/maq' i(ppo/krhmna,
a(\ cumbalei=n ou) r(a/|di' h)=n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
nh\ tou\s qeou\s e)gw\ gou=n
h)/dh pot' e)n makrw=| xro/nw| nukto\s dihgru/pnhsa
to\n couqo\n i(ppalektruo/na zhtw=n ti/s e)stin o)/rnis.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p: shmei=on e)n tai=s nausi\n w)=maqe/stat' e)nege/grapto.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: e)gw\ de\ to\n *filoce/nou g' w)/|mhn *)/erucin ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: ei)=t' e)n tragw|di/ais e)xrh=n ka)lektruo/na poih=sai;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p: su\ d' w)= qeoi=sin e)xqre\ poi=' a)/tt' e)sti\n a(/tt' e)poi/eis;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
ou)x i(ppalektruo/nas ma\ *di/' ou)de\ tragela/fous, a(/per su/,
a(\n toi=si parapeta/smasin toi=s *mhdikoi=s gra/fousin:
a)ll' w(s pare/labon th\n te/xnhn para\ sou= to\ prw=ton eu)qu\s
oi)dou=san u(po\ kompasma/twn kai\ r(hma/twn e)paxqw=n,
i)/sxnana me\n prw/tiston au)th\n kai\ to\ ba/ros a)fei=lon
e)pulli/ois kai\ peripa/tois kai\ teutli/oisi leukoi=s,
xulo\n didou\s stwmulma/twn a)po\ bibli/wn a)phqw=n:
ei)=t' a)ne/trefon monw|di/ais—

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: *khfisofw=nta mignu/s.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
ei)=t' ou)k e)lh/roun o(/ ti tu/xoim' ou)d' e)mpesw
 e)/furon,
a)ll' ou(ciw
 prw/tista me/n moi to\ ge/nos ei)=p' a)
 eu)qu\s
tou= dra/matos.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: krei=tton ga\r h)=n soi nh\ *di/' h)\ to\ sautou=.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
e)/peit' a)po\ tw=n prw/twn e)pw=n ou)de
 parh=k' a)
 a)rgo/n,
a)ll' e)/legen h( gunh/ te/ moi xw) dou=los ou)de
 h(=tton,
xw) despo/ths xh) parqe/nos xh) grau=s a)/n.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ei)=ta dh=ta
ou)k a)poqanei=n se tau=t' e)xrh=n tolmw=nta;

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
ma\ to\n *)apo/llw:
dhmokratiko\n ga\r au)/t' e)/drwn.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
tou=to me\n e)/ason w)= ta=n.
ou) soi\ ga/r e)sti peri/patos ka/llista peri/ ge tou/tou.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: e)/peita toutousi\ lalei=n e)di/daca—

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
fhmi\ ka)gw/.
w(s pri\n dida/cai g' w)/feles me/sos diarragh=nai.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
leptw=n te kano/nwn e)sbola\s e)pw=n te gwniasmou/s,
noei=n o(ra=n cunie/nai stre/fein e)ra=n texna/zein,
ka/x' u(potopei=sqai, perinoei=n a(/panta—

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p: fhmi\ ka)gw/.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
oi)kei=a pra/gmat' ei)sa/gwn, oi(=s xrw/meq', oi(=s cu/nesmen,
e)c w(=n g' a)\n e)chlegxo/mhn: cuneido/tes ga\r ou(=toi
h)/legxon a)/n mou th\n te/xnhn: a)ll' ou)k e)kompola/koun
a)po\ tou= fronei=n a)pospa/sas, ou)d' e)ce/plhtton au)tou/s,
*ku/knous poiw=n kai\ *me/mnonas kwdwnofalaropw/lous.
gnw/sei de\ tou\s tou/tou te ka)mou\s e(kate/rou maqhta/s.
toutoumeni\ *formi/sios *megai/neto/s q' o( *manh=s,
salpiggologxuphna/dai, sarkasmopituoka/mptai,
ou(moi\ de\ *kleitofw=n te kai\ *qhrame/nhs o( komyo/s.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
*qhrame/nhs; sofo/s g' a)nh\r kai\ deino\s e)s ta\ pa/nta,
o(\s h)\n kakoi=s pou peripe/sh| kai\ plhsi/on parasth=|,
pe/ptwken e)/cw tw=n kakw=n, ou) *xi=os a)lla\ *kei=os.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
toiau=ta me/ntou)gw\ fronei=n
tou/toisin ei)shghsa/mhn,
logismo\n e)nqei\s th=| te/xnh|
kai\ ske/yin, w(/st' h)/dh noei\n
a(/panta kai\ dieide/nai
ta/ t' a)/lla kai\ ta\s oi)ki/as
oi)kei=n a)/meinon h)\ pro\ tou=
ka)naskopei=n, pw=s tou=t' e)/xei;
pou= moi todi/; ti/s tou=t' e)/labe;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
nh\ tou\s qeou\s nu=n gou=n *)aqhnai/wn
a(/pas tis ei)siw\n
ke/krage pro\s tou\s oi)ke/tas
zhtei= te, pou= 'stin h( xu/tra;
ti/s th\n kefalh\n a)pedh/doken
th=s maini/dos; to\ tru/blion
to\ perusino\n te/qnhke/ moi:
pou= to\ sko/rodon to\ xqizino/n;
ti/s th=s e)la/as pare/tragen;
te/ws d' a)belterw/tatoi
kexhno/tes *mamma/kuqoi
*meliti/dai kaqh=nto.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ta/de me\n leu/sseis fai/dim' *)axilleu=:
su\ de\ ti/ fe/re pro\s tau=ta le/ceis;
mo/non o(/pws
mh/ s' o( qumo\s a(rpa/sas
e)kto\s oi)/sei tw=n e)law=n:
deina\ ga\r kathgo/rhken.
a)ll' o(/pws w)= genna/da
mh\ pro\s o)rgh\n a)ntile/ceis,
a)lla\ sustei/las a)/kroisi
xrw/menos toi=s i(sti/ois,
ei)=ta ma=llon ma=llon a)/ceis
kai\ fula/ceis,
h(ni/k' a)\n to\ pneu=ma lei=on
kai\ kaqesthko\s la/bh|s.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
a)ll' w)= prw=tos tw=n *(ellh/nwn purgw/sas r(h/mata semna\
kai\ kosmh/sas tragiko
 lh=ron, qarrw=n to
 krouno
 a)fi/ei.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
*eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p:
decio/thtos kai\ nouqesi/as, o(/ti belti/ous te poiou=men
tou\s a)nqrw/pous e)n tai=s po/lesin.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
*dio/nusos
sp.p: teqna/nai: mh\ tou=ton e)rw/ta.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ske/yai toi/nun oi(/ous au)tou\s par' e)mou= parede/cato prw=ton,
ei) gennai/ous kai\ tetraph/xeis, kai\ mh\ diadrasipoli/tas,
mhd' a)gorai/ous mhde\ koba/lous w(/sper nu=n mhde\ panou/rgous,
a)lla\ pne/ontas do/ru kai\ lo/gxas kai\ leukolo/fous trufalei/as
kai\ ph/lhkas kai\ knhmi=das kai\ qumou\s e(ptaboei/ous.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: kai\ dh\ xwrei= touti\ to\ kako/n: kranopoiw=n au)= m' e)pitri/yei.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: kai\ ti/ su\ dra/sas ou(/tws au)tou\s gennai/ous e)cedi/dacas;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: *ai)sxu/le le/con, mhd' au)qa/dws semnuno/menos xale/paine.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p: dra=ma poih/sas *)/arews mesto/n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p: poi=on;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
tou\s e(/pt' e)pi\ *qh/bas:
o(\ qeasa/menos pa=s a)/n tis a)nh\r h)ra/sqh da/ios ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
touti\ me/n soi kako\n ei)/rgastai: *qhbai/ous ga\r pepoi/hkas
a)ndreiote/rous e)s to\n po/lemon, kai\ tou/tou g' ou(/neka tu/ptou.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
a)ll' u(mi=n au)/t' e)ch=n a)skei=n, a)ll' ou)k e)pi\ tou=t' e)tra/pesqe.
ei)=ta dida/cas *pe/rsas meta\ tou=t' e)piqumei=n e)cedi/daca
nika=n a)ei\ tou\s a)ntipa/lous, kosmh/sas e)/rgon a)/riston.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
e)xa/rhn gou=n, †h(ni/k' h)/kousa peri\ *darei/ou teqnew=tos,†
o( xoro\s d' eu)qu\s tw\ xei=r' w(di\ sugkrou/sas ei)=pen i)auoi=.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
tau=ta ga\r a)/ndras xrh\ poihta\s a)skei=n. ske/yai ga\r a)p' a)rxh=s
w(s w)fe/limoi tw=n poihtw=n oi( gennai=oi gege/nhntai.
*)orfeu\s me\n ga\r teleta/s q' h(mi=n kate/deice fo/nwn t' a)pe/xesqai,
*mousai=os d' e)cake/seis te no/swn kai\ xrhsmou/s, *(hsi/odos de\
gh=s e)rgasi/as, karpw=n w(/ras, a)ro/tous: o( de\ qei=os *(/omhros
a)po\ tou= timh\n kai\ kle/os e)/sxen plh\n tou=d' o(/ti xrh/st' e)di/dacen,
ta/ceis a)reta\s o(pli/seis a)ndrw=n;

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
kai\ mh
 ou) *pantakle/a ge
e)di/dacen o(/mws to
 skaio/taton: prw/hn gou=n, h(ni/k' e)/pempen,
to\ kra/nos prw=ton peridhsa/menos to
 lo/fon h)/mell' e)pidh/sein.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
a)ll' a)/llous toi pollou\s a)gaqou/s, w(=n h)=n kai\ *la/maxos h(/rws:
o(/qen h(mh\ frh\n a)pomacame/nh polla\s a)reta\s e)poi/hsen,
*patro/klwn, *teu/krwn qumoleo/ntwn, i(/n' e)pai/roim' a)/ndra poli/thn
a)ntektei/nein au(to\n tou/tois, o(po/tan sa/lpiggos a)kou/sh|.
a)ll' ou) ma\ *di/' ou) *fai/dras e)poi/oun po/rnas ou)de\ *sqeneboi/as,
ou)d' oi)=d' ou)dei\s h(/ntin' e)rw=san pw/pot' e)poi/hsa gunai=ka.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: ma\ *di/' ou) ga\r e)ph=n th=s *)afrodi/ths ou)de/n soi.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
mhde/ g' e)pei/h.
a)ll' e)pi/ toi soi\ kai\ toi=s soi=sin pollh\ pollou= 'pikaqh=to,
w(/ste ge kau)to/n se kat' ou)=n e)/balen.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *di/a tou=to/ ge/ toi dh/.
a(\ ga\r e)s ta\s a)llotri/as e)poi/eis, au)to\s tou/toisin e)plh/ghs.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: kai\ ti/ bla/ptous' w)= sxe/tli' a)ndrw=n th\n po/lin a(mai\ *sqene/boiai;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
o(/ti gennai/as kai\ gennai/wn a)ndrw=n a)lo/xous a)ne/peisas
kw/neia piei=n ai)sxunqei/sas dia\ tou\s sou\s *bellerofo/ntas.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: po/teron d' ou)k o)/nta lo/gon tou=ton peri\ th=s *fai/dras cune/qhka;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' a)ll' o)/nt': a)ll' a)pokru/ptein xrh\ to\ ponhro\n to/n ge poihth/n,
kai\ mh\ para/gein mhde\ dida/skein. toi=s me\n ga\r paidari/oisin
e)/sti dida/skalos o(/stis fra/zei, toi=sin d' h(bw=si poihtai/.
pa/nu dh\ dei= xrhsta\ le/gein h(ma=s.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
*ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
a)ll' w)= kako/daimon a)na/gkh
mega/lwn gnwmw=n kai\ dianoiw=n i)/sa kai\ ta\ r(h/mata ti/ktein.
ka)/llws ei)ko\s tou\s h(miqe/ous toi=s r(h/masi mei/zosi xrh=sqai:
kai\ ga\r toi=s i(mati/ois h(mw=n xrw=ntai polu\ semnote/roisin.
a(mou= xrhstw=s katadei/cantos dielumh/nw su/.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: ti/ dra/sas;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
prw=ton me\n tou\s basileu/ontas r(a/ki' a)mpisxw/n, i(/n' e)leinoi\
toi=s a)nqrw/pois fai/noint' ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *eu)ripi/dhs
sp.p: tou=t' ou)=n e)/blaya/ ti dra/sas;

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ou)/koun e)qe/lei ge trihrarxei=n ploutw=n ou)dei\s dia\ tau=ta,
a)lla\ r(aki/ois perieila/menos kla/ei kai\ fhsi\ pe/nesqai.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
nh\ th\n *dh/mhtra xitw=na/ g' e)/xwn ou)/lwn e)ri/wn u(pe/nerqen.
ka)\n tau=ta le/gwn e)capath/sh|, para\ tou\s i)xqu=s a)ne/kuyen.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
ei)=t' au)= lalia\n e)pithdeu=sai kai\ stwmuli/an e)di/dacas,
h(\ 'ceke/nwsen ta/s te palai/stras kai\ ta\s puga\s e)ne/triyen
tw=n meiraki/wn stwmullome/nwn, kai\ tou\s *para/lous a)ne/peisen
a)ntagoreu/ein toi=s a)/rxousin. kai/toi to/te g' h(ni/k' e)gw\ 'zwn,
ou)k h)pi/stant' a)ll' h)\ ma=zan kale/sai kai\ r(uppapai= ei)pei=n.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *)apo/llw, kai\ prospardei=n g' e)s to\ sto/ma tw=| qala/maki,
kai\ minqw=sai to\n cu/ssiton ka)kba/s tina lwpoduth=sai:
nu=n d' a)ntile/gei kou)ke/t' e)lau/nwn plei= deuri\ kau)=qis e)kei=se.

sp.speaker: *ai)sxu/los
sp.p:
poi/wn de\ kakw=n ou)k ai)/tio/s e)st';
ou) proagwgou\s kate/deic' ou(=tos,
kai\ tiktou/sas e)n toi=s i(eroi=s,
kai\ mignume/nas toi=sin a)delfoi=s,
kai\ faskou/sas ou) zh=n to\ zh=n;
ka)=|t' e)k tou/twn h( po/lis h(mw=n
u(pogrammate/wn a)nemestw/qh
kai\ bwmolo/xwn dhmopiqh/kwn
e)capatw/ntwn to\n dh=mon a)ei/,
lampa/da d' ou)dei\s oi(=o/s te fe/rein
u(p' a)gumnasi/as e)/ti nuni/.

sp.speaker: *dio/nusos
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' ou) dh=q', w(/st' e)pafaua/nqhn
*panaqhnai/oisi gelw=n, o(/te dh\
bradu\s a)/nqrwpo/s tis e)/qei ku/yas
leuko\s pi/wn u(poleipo/menos
kai\ deina\ poiw=n: ka)=|q' oi( *keramh=s
e)n tai=si pu/lais pai/ous' au)tou=
gaste/ra pleura\s lago/nas pugh/n,
o( de\ tupto/menos tai=si platei/ais
u(poperdo/menos
fusw=n th\n lampa/d' e)/feugen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
me/ga to\ pra=gma, polu\ to\ nei=kos, a(dro\s o( po/lemos e)/rxetai.
xalepo\n ou)=n e)/rgon diairei=n,
o(/tan o( me\n tei/nh| biai/ws,
o( d' e)panastre/fein du/nhtai ka)perei/desqai torw=s.
a)lla\ mh\ n' tau)tw=| ka/qhsqon:
e)sbolai\ ga/r ei)si pollai\ xa)/terai sofisma/twn.
o(/ ti per ou)=n e)/xeton e)ri/zein,
le/geton e)/piton a)na/ te de/reton
ta/ te palaia\ kai\ ta\ kaina/,
ka)pokinduneu/eton lepto/n ti kai\ sofo\n le/gein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ei) de\ tou=to katafobei=sqon, mh/ tis a)maqi/a prosh=|
toi=s qewme/noisin, w(s ta\
lepta\ mh\ gnw=nai lego/ntoin,

mhde\n ou)=n dei/shton, a)lla\
pa/nt' e)pe/citon qeatw=n g' ou(/nex' w(s o)/ntwn sofw=n.
